task.summary: refactored both on the server and the client side
refactored server side and added automatic serial detect/connect. This has to be improved later added TODO on this.
Added alarm, both in java and xml.
Added an option to change alarm sound and an option to change doorbell sound.
Added config file to store paths, the affected tabs are music tab, alarm tab and the door bell tab.
Finished refactoring controllers and fxml files.
